hero.title: Kamalo City – Inhliziyo ye-Afrika eThekwini
hero.subtitle: Ukunambitha kwe-Afrika. Indaba kuyo yonke into oyidlayo.
hero.description: Thola ukudla kwangempela kwe-Afrika, imifino yendabuko, i-hookah ephezulu, ukuzilungisa, kanye nokuzijabulisa ngeempelaveki — konke ngaphansi kophahla olulodwa eGoodwood, eKapa.
hero.hours: Kuvuliwe izinsuku ezi-7 ngeviki: 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM

story.title: Indaba Yethu: Kusuka Emabhodlweni Kuya Esigqini
story.description1: I-Kamalo City yaqala ngo-2023 njengesikhungo samasiko lapho ilifa le-Afrika lihlangana nokunambitha okungakhohlakali. Namuhla, yenye yezindawo zokudla ezithandwa kakhulu eKapa.
story.description2: Lokho okwakuyimabhodlo kwakhiwa ngenjongo — ukudala indawo eshisayo yokudla, umculo, kanye nomoya womphakathi ohlonipha okhokho bethu kuyo yonke imidla esiyiphakayo.
story.point1: Kusuka emabhodlweni kuya ekuvuseleleni — Yasungulwa ngo-2023 ngombono nokuzimisela
story.point2: Ukunambitha kwangempela kwe-Afrika — Ulwazi lwesimanje ngamaresiphi endabuko
story.point3: Isikhungo esiphelele samasiko — Ukudla, umculo, imicimbi, nezinsizakalo zempilo
story.quote: Kusuka emabhodlweni kuya esigqini: yavuselelwa ngo-2023, namuhla i-Kamalo City ishaya ngokunambitha, umphakathi nomphefumulo.

timeline.title: Uhambo Lwethu
timeline.description: Kusuka embonweni kuya eqinisweni, thola izinyathelo ezakha i-Kamalo City.

2023.title: Yakhiwa Kabusha Yavulwa
2023.description: Kusuka endaweni eyayishiyiwe kuya endaweni eshisayo yamasiko — i-Kamalo City yavula iminyango yayo ngombono wokudla kwangempela kwe-Afrika.

2024.title: Yaqalisa Imicimbi Nokuzijabulisa Okuphilayo
2024.description: Yandiswa ngokuzijabulisa ngeempelaveki, ukuhlela imicimbi yangasese, nezinsizakalo zempilo ezengeziwe okubandakanya isaluni yezinwele ne-hookah.

2025.title: Yaba Yindawo Ephambili
2025.description: Yasungulwa njengendawo ephambili yokudla nokuzijabulisa kwe-Afrika eKapa, ethandwa abantu bendawo nezivakashi.

services.title: Ngaphezu Kokudla Nje
services.description: Thola ulwazi oluphelele lwe-Kamalo City ngokuzijabulisa, imicimbi, nezinsizakalo zempilo

liveEntertainment.title: Ukuzijabulisa Okuphilayo
liveEntertainment.description: Ubusuku bomculo, ama-DJ, nemibukiso yamasiko ngoLwesihlanu noMgqibelo

privateBookings.title: Ukubhuka Kwangasese
privateBookings.description: Ukuqasha indawo yonke yeminyhadala, imicimbi yebhizinisi, nemigubho kuya kuzivakashi ezingama-80

preOrders.title: Uku-oda Kwangaphambili Nokusebenzela
preOrders.description: Oda kwangaphambili ukuze uzokuthatha noma ujabulele ulwazi lwethu oluphelele lokudla nezinketho zokusebenzela

lifestyle.title: Izinsizakalo Zempilo
lifestyle.description: Isaluni ye-hookah ephezulu, amakha akhethekile, isaluni yezinwele yobuchwepheshe, nobusuku bemidlalo

menu.title: Ukudla Okuvelele
menu.description: Thola ukudla kwethu kwe-Afrika okuthandwa kakhulu, okwenziwe ngokunambitha kwangempela namaresiphi endabuko

pricing.title: Ulwazi Lwentengo Yemenyu
pricing.dailySpecials: Konke Ukudla Kosuku kuyi-R80 ne-pap noma R90 ne-rayisi
pricing.note: *Qaphela: Amanani endlini ahlukile kumanani e-Uber Eats.

testimonials.title: Lokho Amakhasimende Ethu Akushoyo
testimonials.description: Ulwazi lwangempela oluvela kuzivakashi zethu ezibalulekile

gallery.title: Igalari Yethu
gallery.description: Hlola umhlaba oshisayo we-Kamalo City ngeqoqo lethu lezikhathi, kusuka ekudleni okumnandi kuya emicimbini eshisayo nezinsizakalo eziphezulu.
gallery.experienceDescription: Ukulungele ukudala izinkumbulo zakho? Sivakashele ukuze uthole ukudla kwangempela kwe-Afrika nokuzijabulisa.

faq.title: Imibuzo Ebuzwa Njalo
faq.description: Konke okudingeka ukwazi ngolwazi lwakho lwe-Kamalo City

footer.description: Lapho ilifa elinotyebi le-Afrika lihlangana nokunambitha okungakhohlakali. Woza ngokunambitha — hlala ngenxa yomoya.
footer.tagline: Noma ulapha ukuze udle, uphumule, noma ugubhe — i-Kamalo City yindawo lapho sonke isikhathi siba yinkumbulo.

reservations.title: Bhuka Ulwazi Lwakho
reservations.description: Ufuna indawo efanelekile eKapa? I-Kamalo City inikeza ukudla kwangasese, amaphathi okuzalwa, imicimbi yebhizinisi, nokunye. Jabulela ukudla kwangempela, isimo eshisayo, nesinsizakalo esihle.
reservations.openHours: Kuvuliwe: 11:00 AM kuya ku-11:00 PM, izinsuku ezi-7 ngeviki
reservations.successMessage: Isicelo sokubhuka sithunyelwe! Sizoqinisekisa emahora angu-2.
reservations.confirmationNote: Sizoqinisekisa ukubhuka kwakho emahora angu-2. Ukubhuka okuphuthumayo, sishayele ngqo.
reservations.contactDescription: Xhumana nathi manje ukuze uvikele itafula lakho noma uxoxe ngezinketho zemicimbi yangasese.
reservations.specialRequirementsNote: Ngezidingo ezikhethekile noma amaqembu amakhulu, sicela ushayele

about.title: Ilifa Elinikwe Ukuphila
about.description: I-Kamalo City yazalwa emabhodlweni yakhiwa ngenjongo. Kusuka ngo-2023, sikhule saba yindawo yokudla, umculo, nomoya womphakathi.
about.foundersDescription1: Kuzalwe ukuthanda ukuletha ukunambitha kokhokho enhliziyweni yeKapa, i-Kamalo City ihlanganisa ukudla kwangempela kwe-Afrika nolwazi lwesimanje lomphakathi. Sisebenza njengesikhungo samasiko — lapho abantu behlangana, baphumula, futhi bajabulele ukuphila.
about.foundersDescription2: I-Kamalo City yasungulwa nguPitchou Ntumba nomkakhe, abadala indawo ephambili yokudla nokuzijabulisa kwe-Afrika eKapa. Umbono wabo ohlanganisiwe nekhono labo lokwamukela izivakashi kuguqule le ndawo yaba ngumgubho oshisayo wokudla namasiko e-Afrika.
about.foundersDescription3: Ngaphansi kobuholi babo, i-Kamalo City ikhule yangaphezu kwendlu yokudla nje — yisikhungo samasiko lapho abantu behlangana ukuze bajabulele ukudla kwangempela kwe-Afrika, ulwazi lwe-shisha oluhle, izinsizakalo zokuzilungisa zobuchwepheshe, nokuzijabulisa.
about.ctaDescription: Ukulungele ukuba yingxenye yolwazi lwe-Kamalo City? Sivakashele uze unambithise uthando kuyo yonke imidla.

contact.title: Asixhumane
contact.description: Udinga izikhombisi? Ufuna ukwenza ukubhuka? Silapha ukusiza — xhumana nathi nganoma yisiphi isikhathi.
contact.visitDescription: Yenza ukubhuka noma nje weze ukuze uthole ulwazi lokudla kwangempela kwe-Afrika eKapa.
